Reviews.Title: Not User Friendly
Reviews.Author: Daniel I. Rabun "Journey Dude"
Reviews.Content: Very hard to work with. I finally had to get a professional IT guy to assist me with it. His advice was to return it.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP - YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!
Reviews.Author: USO 314
Reviews.Content: ok. The operating system is ok. you cannot put parental locks or setup multiple users. I bought this for my 12 year old son so having an administrator on the comutr would be a must. Also, the screen resolution is HORRIBLE!!!! if i had known the true quality and limited capabilities of the Polaroid - i would not have purchased it!! lastly, the camera - you would think that POLAROID would have a decent camera on the tablet - not the case. there are much better products out there for the money - DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!! OR MONEY ON THIS ITEM!!!

Reviews.Title: very dissappointing
Reviews.Author: gracie
Reviews.Content: This tablet worked okay the first three days only. The power button does not function properly. Sometimes I get no internet connection. Almost always it disconnects me when I am in the middle of typing or browsing! It rotates screen without even touching or holding it. Switches me from one website to another. Has many malfunctions. It gives me so much stress I can't bear the thought of dealing with th return!!!  So much for a happy new year. It SUCKS, don't buy it. I really was excited when I ordered but so depressed now and unhappy with it.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for..
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I was warned...I thought they would work ok, for my use. I ordered two units, one would not boot up right out of the box. The other would "lock up" during use. I sent them both back 4 weeks ago, and am still waiting for results.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: William Johnson
Reviews.Content: Purchased it because of the price,just needed something  for e- books and checking e-mails.Have high speed internet and the tablet was still extremely slow and the screen is non-responsive 30% of the time.Ended up buying a different one.....the polaroid is now in the trash...

Reviews.Title: why i return the tablet
Reviews.Author: jaime sanchez
Reviews.Content: The tablet was good till one morning you could hear something but can't see nothing when the tablet worked i think is a good tablet

ProductInfo.Features:
High Resolution 10.1" Capacitive Multi-Touch Color Display (1024x600); Front & Rear Cameras; Wireless Internet Connection (Wi-Fi)
1GB DDR3 RAM; 8GB Internal Memory
Operating System: Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich); Processor: 1.0Ghz Cortex A8
Built-in Stereo Speakers & Microphone; Micro SD Card Slot (External Memory); HDMI output (HDMI cable not supplied)
Pre loaded with facebook and twitter; PC and mac compatible.
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid PMID1000 Android 10.1-inch Capacitive Multi-Touch Color Display Tablet w/ Dual Cameras 8GB Internal Memory WiFi Built-In Stereo Speakers and Microphone (Black)
